DOC.brief_summary: AKINESIS clinical study assess utility blood urine NGAL test predict worsen kidney function patient present acute heart failure ( AHF ) treat diuretic . It believe rise NGAL level blood and/or urine predict acute kidney injury . It also believe patient admit hospital high NGAL level blood/urine poor outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Kidney Injury Neutrophil Gelatinase-Associated Lipocalin ( N-GAL ) Evaluation Symptomatic Heart Failure Study ( AKINESIS )
DOC.criteria: Subjects must least 18 year age . Subjects must present hospital one sign symptoms acute heart failure ( AHF ) . Signs symptom include shortness breath walking , rales crackle , gallop heart rhythm , jugular venous distension , trouble breathe rest lying , wake breathless night , use 2 pillow sleep , tire easily , swell foot , ankle leg , frequent coughing , cough produce mucous bloodtinged sputum , dry cough lie flat . Subjects must receive IV diuretic , must intent treat IV diuretic . Subjects must willing able comply aspect protocol . Subjects must provide sign informed consent . Subjects present symptom consistent acute coronary syndrome ( AMI UA ) chief cause current episode AHF . Subjects already dialysis prior enrollment dialysis initiation already plan current hospital visit . Subjects major organ transplant ( heart , lung , kidney , liver ) . Subjects participate drug treatment study within past 30 day already enrol subject study . Women verbally report pregnant time screen anyone belong vulnerable population deem inappropriate inclusion study IRB/EC .
